page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: Beside the school is{Eton Wick {Anglican Church}which was built in 1866{Queen Victoria}gave Â£100.00 and the site for the church. The {Rev.C.Johnson}has been the vicar of Eton Wick and Eton for 18 years. The church holds 100 people but the Sunday morning congregations are about 30 people and the evening's 10 people. There is a Sunday School. Rev.C.Johnson works with the{Roman {Catholic and Methodist Churches}in the village. The church is not connected with any other Anglican Churches at the moment but when the vicar leaves the church will join the{Riverside {Team}Ministry.There are no other clerical workers in the parish the vicar sees the of the church as a continuing witness to God's presence and as serving the people through baptisim,weddings and funerals.
